statements: DELETE FROM communication_history WHERE agent_id IS NULL
DELETE FROM communication_history WHERE communication_id = 100 AND agent_id IS NULL;
DELETE FROM communication_history WHERE policyholder_id = 500 AND interaction_type = 'Email';
DELETE FROM communication_history WHERE communication_id = 100 AND agent_id = 200;

DELETE FROM Communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' AND communication_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Agents WHERE agent_id = 1234 AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM interactions WHERE agent = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM phone_calls WHERE call_id = 500 AND call_duration > 60;
